scripts.build: npm run build-subprojects && npm run collect-dist
scripts.build-subprojects: node -e "require('os').platform().startsWith('win') ? require('child_process').execSync('npm run build-subprojects-windows', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('npm run build-subprojects-unix', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.build-subprojects-unix: for d in */; do if [ -f "$d/package.json" ]; then (cd "$d" && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build); fi; done
scripts.build-subprojects-windows: for /d %d in (*) do if exist "%d\package.json" ( pushd "%d" && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && popd )
scripts.collect-dist: node -e "require('os').platform().startsWith('win') ? require('child_process').execSync('npm run collect-dist-windows', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('npm run collect-dist-unix', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.collect-dist-unix: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && for d in */; do if [ -d "$d/dist" ]; then cp -R "$d/dist" "dist/${d%/}"; fi; done
scripts.collect-dist-windows: if exist dist rmdir /S /Q dist && mkdir dist && for /d %d in (*) do if exist "%d\dist" ( xcopy "%d\dist" "dist\%d" /E /I )
